name: Mask Of The Timeless
Mirror Shield
notes:
When attacked, will deal damage to the attacking enemy equal to 30% of the damage taken by the trinket holder. Reflected damage only occurs after the attack.
This damage does not count as an attack from the equipped hero and is not affected by hero buffs nor enemy PROT.
Kills from this damage do not count for kill effects such as from the Miller's Pipe or Coat of Many Colors.

name: Coat Of Many Colors
effect:
• On Monster Kill: Buff Self: -2% Stress (2 Battles)
  • On Monster Kill: Buff Self: +2 ACC (2 Battles)
  • Hero Killed: Party: Stun (120% base)
  • Hero Killed: Party: Stress +25
notes: This trinket's name is a reference to the biblical coat of many colors worn by Joseph.

name: Miller's Pipe
effect:
• On Monster Kill: Stress -2
  • On Monster Kill: All Monsters: Blight (120% base) 2 pts/rd for 3 rds
  • Hero Killed: Party: Stress +45
  • Hero Killed: Party: Debuff Target: -20% PROT (100% base) (Quest)
  • Hero Killed: Party: Debuff Target: -2 SPD (100% base) (Quest)
notes: Enemies killed by damage-over-time effects applied by the equipped hero will trigger On Monster Kill effects. This also applies to the Blight the Pipe itself inflicts after an enemy is killed.

name: Talisman of the Flame

Quest reward for the first Darkest Dungeon quest, "We Are The Flame."

Despite claiming to be -100% Stress, the trinket will only reduce the stress received by 80%, since that is the cap of stress-reducing buffs.
